name: icarus
description: An Arch Linux repository for CTF players, containing packages that range from popular tools all the way to obscure utilities, mainly focused on binary reversing, pwn, steganography and forensics

name: shiba
description: All-in-one webapp prototyping companion. A versatile and easy-to-use tool that can act as a static HTTP server, CORS proxy, REST API and more

name: website
description: Personal website created using svelte and tailwind css

name: archer
description: Automated arch linux install script for brainlets

name: raytracer
description: Simple ray tracer implemented in pure C following Peter Shirley's 'Ray Tracing in a Weekend' book, with some extra features like: realtime output, multithreaded rendering, scene loading and avx intrinsics

name: ansify
description: Image to ansi rgb escape sequence converter
